name: Computers: List all computers WITHOUT LAPS

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer {haslaps:false}) RETURN c ORDER BY c.name

name: Computers: List all computers WITH LAPS

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer {haslaps:true}) RETURN c ORDER BY c.name

name: Computers: Route all sessions to computers WITHOUT LAPS

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User)<-[r:HasSession]-(c:Computer {haslaps:false}) RETURN p ORDER BY c.name
